participant_1.background:
I'm looking forward to playing at a local music festival with my band.
I am so proud of my daughter for graduating at the top of her class!
I love music that makes me feel nostalgic, like the music of my father's era.
i am glad that i work from home.
i also dance and sing.

participant_2.background:
I will teach my children to appreciate good music and be tolerant of others' tastes.
I threw a huge party to celebrate my new freedom.
I love watermelon because it's sweet and refreshing.
i am a night owl , but i am an introvert so i do not go out much or anything.
My most difficult job was cutting down a large tree that had fallen on a power line.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
Good, just finished cutting down a large tree that had fallen on a power line.
Oh no! That sounds scary! Are you okay?
Yeah, I'm fine. It was a lot of work though.
I bet it was! What do you do for work?
Oh that's cool! I love trees! What's your favorite kind of tree?
I like pine trees because they smell so good.
Me too! I love the smell of pine trees. What are your hobbies?
I like to play music, go hiking, and spend time with my family.
That sounds great! I like to play music too. What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and sing. I'm in a band.
Oh that's cool! I love to sing too. What kind of music does your band play?
Oh that's cool! I love rock and roll. Do you have any upcoming shows?
We're playing at a local music festival next weekend.
Oh that's awesome! I'll have to check it out!
It's going to be a lot of fun!
